article_title: Hellmann’s Seeks Justice vs. Just Mayo
article_text:
A legal fight over mayonnaise between Unilever PLC and a California startup is spotlighting the way shifting consumer tastes are roiling traditional food categories.

Unilever, the maker of Hellmann’s and Best Foods brands of mayonnaise, is accusing Hampton Creek Inc. of false advertising for calling its eggless spread “mayo.” In a complaint filed in U.S. District Court in New Jersey, the consumer-products giant is demanding Hampton...

twitter.description: Unilever, the maker of Hellmann’s and Best Foods brands of mayonnaise, is accusing Hampton Creek of false advertising for calling its eggless spread Just Mayo.
twitter.title: Hellmann’s Seeks Justice vs. Just Mayo
